bug.author: KengoWada
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
Please provide a link to the documentation entry, for example: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/maximum>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/maximum</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of the issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
The description is not clear enough. <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
The links are okay. <denchmark-h:h3>Parameters defined</denchmark-h>
The parameters are defined. <denchmark-h:h3>Returns defined</denchmark-h>
The return values are defined. <denchmark-h:h3>Raises listed and defined</denchmark-h>
Errors are not defined or listed. <denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
There is no usage example. <denchmark-h:h3>Request visuals, if applicable</denchmark-h>
There are no visuals. <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
No.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/KengoWada>@KengoWada</denchmark-link> could you please fill out the form you submitted above by replacing the non-bold text with you text?
Sorry about that. I have updated the form. Thank you.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/KengoWada>@KengoWada</denchmark-link> , Closing this issue since the associated PR has been merged. Feel free to reopen if the problem still persists. Thanks!
